com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Interface Requirement

All Superinterfaces:
DeployModelObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
Reference
public interface Requirement
extends DeployModelObject

A representation of the model object 'Requirement'. A Requirement expresses a configuration or runtime dependency of its containing Unit.

The requirement must be satisfied by a Capability. Typically, the capability will be on another unit. The linking will depend on the getLinkType() of the requirement.

  • RequirementLinkTypes.DEPENDENCY : the linking is through getLink().
  • RequirementLinkTypes.HOSTING: the linking is through a HostingLink contained in the parent Unit.
  • RequirementLinkTypes.MEMBER: the linking is through a MemberLink contained in the parent Unit.
  • RequirementLinkTypes.ANY: rarely used for capabilities that can be simultaneously dependency, hosting, and member.

The following features are supported:

  • Extends
  • Link Type
  • Use

See Also:
CorePackage.getRequirement()

getLinkType

RequirementLinkTypes getLinkType()
Returns the value of the 'Link Type' attribute. The default value is "dependency". The literals are from the enumeration RequirementLinkTypes.

If the meaning of the 'Link Type' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

Shall Requirement be met by a DependencyLink or UnitLink; matches against Capability.linkType

Returns:
the value of the 'Link Type' attribute.
See Also:
RequirementLinkTypes, isSetLinkType(), unsetLinkType(), setLinkType(RequirementLinkTypes), CorePackage.getRequirement_LinkType()

getUse

getDmoEType

EClass getDmoEType()
Returns the #getCapabilityType() XMLNS QualifiedName converted to an EMF EClass.

The conversion requires that the DeployModelObject.getTopology() be non-null, and contained in a DeployCoreRoot.

Returns:
the EClass corresponding to the XMLNS QualifiedName.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if DeployModelObject.getTopology().eContainer() == null.

setDmoEType

void setDmoEType(EClass type)
Sets the value of the #setCapabilityType(Object) attribute by converting the EClass to an XMLNS QualifiedName.

The conversion requires that the DeployModelObject.getTopology() be non-null, and contained in a DeployCoreRoot.

Parameters:
type - the ECore type to be converted to an XMLNS QualifiedName.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if DeployModelObject.getTopology().eContainer() == null.

getLink

Returns:
DependencyLink with a target Capability.
